RankDef.description: A student of temple doctrine, learning the sacred teachings and traditions.
A keeper of temple records and sacred texts, preserving ancient knowledge.
A learned member of the Temple, versed in doctrine and capable of teaching others.
An experienced educator who guides new initiates in the ways of the Tribunal.
An enlightened teacher and keeper of temple wisdom, able to guide others on the path of understanding.
The ultimate authority on temple doctrine and sacred knowledge, guardian of the most ancient secrets.
The supreme authority of the Order of Doctrine and Ordination, keeper of all sacred knowledge and answering only to the Alma Rula.
